title: Iridium Skyblock设置默认出生点位置
author: 划水空白
txt_content:
玩家生成空岛会在树上 必须要自己设置is sethome 有没有什么设置修改默认位置 我知道玩家生成的空岛位置都不一样 
我的意思是默认在玩家生成空岛的位置

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
空桑哥哥 发表于 2020-4-21 10:26
尝试改一下这个xyz试试

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
Schematics.json

name The name of the overworld schematic. Place the schematic you want to add in the plugins/IridiumSkyblock/schematics folder.

x The x-axis the players should spawn at.

y The y-axis the players should spawn at.

z The z-axis the players should spawn at.
在schematics.json里面修改

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
空岛插件的话个人推荐bentobox和其扩展插件bskyblock
iridium skyblock我也用过，感觉属实没有bskyblock好用

replies.txt_content:
